None.Name: Goblin Trap
None.Description: Creates a mine for 20 seconds that explodes as soon as enemies are nearby triggering 6 bursting waves that each deal 200 damage to enemies and 50 to structures in a 15m radius, up to 600 in total. Affects ground targets only. Knocks back small units. Reusable every 10 seconds.
